db:abstract.db:para: Information about changes of licenses in Qt and Third Party Modules.

db:article.db:para: Changes in Qt and Third Party Modules released with Qt that are relevant to licensing.

db:section.db:title: Qt GUI Module
db:section.db:para: MD4C got updated to upstream version 0.4.3.

db:section.db:title: Qt SQL Module
db:section.db:para: SQLite got updated to upstream version 3.31.1.

db:listitem.db:para: PCRE2 got updated to upstream version 10.34.
PCRE2 - Stack-less Just-In-Time Compiler got updated to upstream version 10.34.

db:section.db:title: Qt QML Module
db:section.db:para: LLVM: ADT was removed from 3rd party sources and we are not bundling that library anymore.

db:listitem.db:para: Unicode Common Locale Data Repository (CLDR) got updated to upstream version v36.
Efficient Binary-Decimal and Decimal-Binary Conversion Routines for IEEE Doubles got updated to upstream version 3.1.5.
The copy of the The Public Suffix List got updated on 2019-10-23.
Freetype 2 got updated to upstream version 2.10.1.
LibJPEG-turbo got updated to upstream version 2.0.3.
MD4C version 0.3.4 was added under MIT License.
Vulkan Memory Allocator version 2.2.0 was added under MIT License.

db:section.db:title: Qt Image Formats
db:section.db:para: libtiff got updated to upstream version 4.1.0.

db:section.db:title: Qt QML Module
db:section.db:para: LLVM: ADT was added under University of Illinois/NCSA Open Source License.

db:section.db:title: Qt SQL Module
db:section.db:para: SQLite got updated to upstream version 3.30.1.

db:section.db:title: Qt Wayland Compositor
db:section.db:para: The compositor module is no longer available under the GPLv2 and LGPLv3 licenses, but is still available under GPLv3 and commercial licenses.

db:listitem.db:para: The xdg-output-unstable-v1 protocol version 2 was added under the MIT License.
The idle-inhibit-unstable-v1 protocol version 1 was added under the MIT License.
The primary-selection-unstable-v1 protocol version 1 was added under the MIT License.
X Server helper was added under X11 License and Historical Permission Notice and Disclaimer license.
Adobe Glyph List For New Fonts version 1.7 was added under BSD 3-Clause "New" or "Revised" License.

db:section.db:title: Qt SQL Module
db:section.db:para: SQLite got updated to upstream version 3.29.0.

db:section.db:title: Qt Core Module
db:section.db:para: Unicode Common Locale Data Repository (CLDR) got updated to upstream version v35.1

db:section.db:title: Qt Image Formats
db:section.db:para: WebP (libwebp) got updated to upstream version 1.0.3.

db:listitem.db:para: The copy of the The Public Suffix List got updated on 2019-02-20. The upstream license is now MPL 2.0.
PCRE2 got updated to upstream version 10.33.
PCRE2 - Stack-less Just-In-Time Compiler got updated to upstream version 10.33.

db:section.db:title: Qt SQL Module
db:section.db:para: SQLite got updated to upstream version 3.28.0.

db:listitem.db:para: LibJPEG-turbo got updated to upstream version 2.0.2.
LibPNG got updated to upstream version 1.6.37.

db:section.db:title: Qt DBUS Module
db:section.db:para: The libdus-1 headers got updated to upstream version 1.12.12.

db:listitem.db:para: The fullscreen-shell-unstable-v1 version 1 was added under the MIT License.
The linux-dmabuf-unstable-v1 protocol version 3 was added under the MIT License.
The wayland protocol got updated to version 1.16.0.
The wl-scaler protocol version 2 was added under the MIT License.
The wp-viewporter protocol version 1 was added under the MIT License.

db:section.db:title: Qt SQL Module
db:section.db:para: SQLite got updated to upstream version 3.29.0.

db:section.db:title: Qt GUI Module
db:section.db:para: Use of Adobe Glyph List For New Fonts under the BSD-3-Clause license is now documented.

db:section.db:title: Qt Image Formats
db:section.db:para: WebP (libwebp) got updated to upstream version 1.0.3.

db:section.db:title: Qt GUI Module
db:section.db:para: LibPNG got updated to upstream version 1.6.37.

db:listitem.db:para: PCRE2 got updated to upstream version 10.33
PCRE2 - Stack-less Just-In-Time Compiler got updated to upstream version 10.33
Unicode Common Locale Data Repository (CLDR) got updated to upstream version v35.1

db:section.db:title: Qt SQL Module
db:section.db:para: SQLite got updated to upstream version 3.28.0.

db:section.db:title: Qt GUI Module
db:section.db:para: The license of Wintab API was now classified as 'Custom' instead of 'Public Domain'.

db:section.db:title: Qt SQL Module
db:section.db:para: SQLite got updated to upstream version 3.27.1.

db:listitem.db:para: Freetype 2 got updated to upstream version 2.9.1.
LibPNG got updated to upstream version 1.6.36. libpng License 2 added at same time.

db:section.db:title: Qt Image Formats
db:section.db:para: WebP (libwebp) got updated to upstream version 1.0.2.

db:listitem.db:para: The version information for FreeBSD got updated.
The version information for Secure Hash Algorithm SHA-3 - Keccak got updated.
UCD got updated to upstream version 20.

db:section.db:title: Qt GUI Module
db:section.db:para: xkbcommon was removed from 3rd party sources and we are not bundling that library any more.

db:section.db:title: Qt Image Formats
db:section.db:para: WebP (libwebp) got updated to upstream version 1.0.1. libtiff got updated to upstream version 4.0.10.

db:section.db:title: Qt SQL Module
db:section.db:para: SQLite got updated to upstream version 3.26.0.

db:section.db:title: Qt Virtual Keyboard Module
db:section.db:para: The version information for Lipi Toolkit got updated.

db:section.db:title: Qt Wayland Compositor Module
db:section.db:para: The usage of Wayland EGLStream Controller Protocol under MIT license is now documented.

db:section.db:title: Qt 3D Module
db:section.db:para: Use of Miramar Skybox Textures is now documented.

db:listitem.db:para: Efficient Binary-Decimal and Decimal-Binary Conversion Routines for IEEE Doubles got updated to upstream version 3.1.1.
PCRE2 got updated to upstream version 10.32.
Use of PCRE2 - Stack-less Just-In-Time Compiler under the BSD 2-clause "Simplified" license is now documented.

Secure Hash Algorithm SHA-3 - brg_endian got updated to version https://github.com/BrianGladman/sha/ commit 4b9e13ead2c5b5e41ca27c65de4dd69ae0bac228. License got updated to BSD 2-clause "Simplified" license.
Use of TinyCBOR under the MIT license is now documented.
Unicode Common Locale Data Repository (CLDR) got updated to upstream version v34.
The version information for Freetype 2 got updated.
The Qt usage documentation for HarfBuzz got updated.
The Qt usage documentation for HarfBuzz-NG got updated.
The version information for IAccessible2 IDL Specification got updated.
LibJPEG-turbo got updated to upstream version 2.0.0.
LibPNG got updated to upstream version 1.6.35.
Use of Bitstream Vera Font under the vera_font{Bitstream Vera Font} license is now documented.
DejaVu Fonts got updated to upstream version 2.37 and their use under the Bitstream DejaVu Font license is now documented.
Use of WebGradients under the MIT license is now documented.

db:section.db:title: Qt DBUS Module
db:section.db:para: libdus-1 headers got updated to upstream version 1.12.

db:listitem.db:para: JasPer got removed.
MNG reference library got removed.
Use of Tango Weather Icon Pack by Darkobra is now documented.
Use of Tango Icons is now documented.

db:section.db:title: Qt Test Module
db:section.db:para: Valgrind got updated to upstream version 3.14.0.

db:listitem.db:para: Use of Wayland xdg-decoration Protocol under the MIT license is now documented.
Use of Wayland XDG Output Protocol under the MIT license is now documented.

db:section.db:title: Qt WebEngine Module
db:section.db:para: Chromium and third-party components bundled with it were updated to version 69.0.3497.

db:section.db:title: Qt Core Module
db:section.db:para: PCRE2 got updated to upstream version 10.31.

db:listitem.db:para: The copyright information for HarfBuzz got updated.
The copyright information for Anti-aliasing rasterizer from FreeType 2 got updated.

db:section.db:title: Qt Location Module
db:section.db:para: The copyright information and description of Clipper Polygon Clipping Library got updated.

db:section.db:title: Qt SQL Module
db:section.db:para: SQLite got updated to upstream version 3.24.0.

db:listitem.db:para: Chromium received backported security fixes from Chromium up to version 68.0.3440.75.

The WebEngine StyleSheet Browser Example, WebEngine Widgets Simple Browser Example, WebEngine Quick Nano Browser, and WebEngine Cookie Browser Example use images from the Tango Icon Library. This is now documented.
Marked (WebEngine RecipeBrowser example) got updated to upstream version 0.4.0.

db:section.db:title: Qt 3D Module
db:section.db:para: The use of the nasa-jpl{Jet Propulsion Laboratory Photojournal} in the module is actually limited to the planets-qml example. The attribution has therefore been removed from the module's documentation.

db:section.db:title: Qt Documentation
db:section.db:para: Use of the Titillium Web Font in the Coffee demo is now documented.

db:section.db:title: Qt Image Formats
db:section.db:para: WebP (libwebp) got updated to version 1.0.0.

db:listitem.db:para: The Open Asset Import Library got updated to upstream version 4.1.0.
Examples use some assets from Substance Share that are available under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 license. This is now documented.
Parts of QTemporaryFile got removed from documentation. The corresponding code got removed already in Qt 5.10.0.
The copy of the The Public Suffix List got updated on 2018-01-04.

The concluded license for the Unicode Common Locale Data Repository (CLDR) changed to Unicode License Agreement - Data Files and Software (2016). In Qt 5.10 documentation, the component was labelled as Unicode CLDR (Unicode Common Locale Data Repository).
The use of the Unicode Character Database (UCD) under the Unicode License Agreement - Data Files and Software (2016). is now documented.

db:section.db:title: Qt D-Bus Module
db:section.db:para: Qt D-Bus uses code from libdbus-1 headers that are available under the Academic Free License v2.1, or GNU General Public License v2.0 or later. This is now documented.

db:listitem.db:para: HarfBuzz-NG got updated to upstream version 1.7.4.
LibJPEG-turbo got updated to upstream version 1.5.3.
TIFF Software Distribution (libtiff) got updated to upstream version 4.0.9.
WebP (libwebp) got updated to upstream version 0.6.1.

db:section.db:title: Qt Quick Controls 2 Module
db:section.db:para: Use of Shadow values from Angular Material under MIT License in the Material Style is now documented.

db:section.db:title: Qt SQL Module
db:section.db:para: SQLite got updated to upstream version 3.23.1.

db:section.db:title: Qt Test Module
db:section.db:para: The concluded license of Linux Performance Events changed to GNU General Public License v2.0 only with Linux Syscall Note.

db:listitem.db:para: (Components of) Bazel got added under the Apache License 2.0.
Breakpad, An open-source multi-platform crash reporting system got added under a New BSD, Apple PSL 2.0 and Apache 2.0 license.
BoringSSL got updated.
CRC32C got added under a New BSD license.
Error Prone got removed.
Fiat-Crypto: Synthesizing Correct-by-Construction Code for Cryptographic Primitives got added under a MIT license.
OpenVR SDK got added under a BSD 3-Clause license.
Perfetto got added under a Apache 2 license.
The library to input, validate, and display addresses got removed.
content_shell_fonts got added under SIL OPEN FONT LICENSE, GPL v2, Bitstream Vera Fonts Copyright.
libcxx got removed.
libcxxabi got removed.
libunwind got removed.
libva got removed.
libxslt got added under a MIT license.
open-vcdiff got removed.

db:section.db:title: Qt XML Patterns Module
db:section.db:para: Use of XML Schema under W3C Software Notice and Document License (2015-05-13) is now documented.
